overview:
Classic values - honesty, integrity and hard work - have always been the foundation for my success in life and business. It is exactly these values that I try to bring to my work as a realtor. A lifelong Oakville area resident, I attended McMaster University where I earned two degrees, my B.A. in psychology and my B.Sc. in biology. Afterwards, I felt a change was needed and I put my energy into the real estate business.

My focus on timeless values and their application to my career have been the key to my success as a real estate professional. Attention to detail, thorough communication, and the determination to achieve my clientsâ€™ goals is the foundation of setting a higher standard of service.
